name: cloud-nine

effect.black_white: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to air lock.
effect.black_2_white_2: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to air lock.

short_effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.
